scripts.gh-pages: yarn clean && yarn build && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.build-lib: cd neth && yarn && npx tsc && cd ..
scripts.build: yarn build-lib && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --no-source-maps && yarn static
scripts.deploy-account-map: yarn build-account-map && near deploy --accountId map.neth.testnet --wasmFile out/account-map.wasm
scripts.dev-deploy: rm -rf neardev && (near dev-deploy || exit 0) && yarn patch-config
scripts.test-deploy: yarn build-contract && yarn dev-deploy && yarn test
scripts.deploy-app: yarn clean; yarn build; yarn gh-pages -d dist
